Desc.entry: One of the country's 7 community forests, the South Yorkshire Forest covers nearly 300 square miles and takes in parts of Sheffield, Rotherham, Doncaster and Barnsley. Includes a programme of tree planting and improving derelict and degraded land with the intention of aiding economic regeneration, creating jobs and making a better place to work and live. It aims also to create better access to countryside, recreation, wildlife conservation and environmental education.

Pubs.entry: Newsletter; Its Your Forest; Forest plans; Zone maps; Annual Review
